summary: Titus brings on-chain options to the DeFi ecosystem - Titus is a platform that brings on-chain options to the DeFi ecosystem. It offers features such as flash exercise, ERC-20 compatibility, non-custodial control of funds, and no counterparty risk. The Titus Token (TITUS) is directly tied to the success of the Titus network and has governance rights. TITUS can be bought on various platforms. Titus Project Inc, the company behind Titus, is not licensed in any jurisdiction.
